QuestData.Title: Culling the Cullers
QuestData.Description:
These wyrms don't belong here. I don't know what's driven them from their underground lairs, but there's no way to help them, now.
We can't allow them to destroy the native life here.
Slay the wyrms, $n. Keep their parts, if you must, and find me in the Gleamlet when you're done.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Ice Slitherers and Ice Borers near the Kauriq Gleamlet.
QuestData.RewardText: It's a pity to wipe out any natural life... even troublesome ones.
